moreBlocks.lawyersAtDugan&Campbell,PLLCSelectedForA: • Dugan, Christopher On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
With decades of experience, the team at Dugan & Campbell, PLLC, is devoted solely to helping victims of personal injury overcome obstacles and secure compensation. They serve people in Denver, Colorado, and throughout Adams County. Starting with a free initial consultation, the attorneys at this law office dive deeply into the details of what occurred. They catalog every instance of negligence and every way in which a client's life has been changed as a result.

This law office has earned an exceptional reputation not only for returning significant awards, but also for the way the team treats clients. For their efforts, the attorneys here have been recognized in the following ways:

  • Holding an Avvo "Superb" rating
  • Being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40
  • Getting named in the American Institute of Personal Injury Lawyers' 10 Best for Client Satisfaction

More important than the accolades, however, are the ways in which this team provides a path to recovery for clients. Because the attorneys take on the legal aspects of the incident, people who have experienced a wrongful death, a car accident or an insurance bad faith claim are able to focus on rebuilding.

Pulling on resources from groups such as the Colorado Trial Lawyers Association, the attorneys at this law office consistently construct solid strategies. Whether through negotiating a settlement or taking a case to trial, they remain steadfast advocates for victims of negligence. Dugan & Campbell, PLLC, accepts credit cards.
